content:
Generate a concise 3-5 word title for this software task. Respond with ONLY the title in lowercase, nothing else. No quotes, no punctuation.

implement a custom /kas.verify tiered review process for PRs (evaluate using codex code review or some other github integration to use specific skills/review process we need to research it). this should trigger for new prs (not drafts) and kasmos should monitor the state of it somewhere non-invasive like a status bar (maybe bottom left or right?)
